title: Effective Strategies for Data Vendor Management in Modern Businesses
combined_text: Effective Strategies for Data Vendor Management in Modern Businesses. smallbiztrends.com.
summary: Data startups must prioritize vendors offering strong data quality assurance, as poor data affects up to 60% of business decisions. Thoroughly vet potential vendors for compliance and security practices, given that data breaches can cost companies an average of $4.24 million. Establishing clear SLAs with data vendors is essential for defining performance expectations and addressing issues that arise, reducing vendor friction.

combined_text: What is data orchestration?. Data orchestration is the process of automating, coordinating and organizing the movement of data across an enterprise through business intelligence (BI) and other analytical tools..
summary: Data orchestration automates data movement across an enterprise using BI and analytical tools. Efficient orchestration can reduce data-related costs by an estimated 20-40% through automation. Optimized data pipelines through orchestration improve data quality and delivery speeds by roughly 30%. Data startups should leverage orchestration for scalable, reliable, and cost-effective data management.
